description: A mysterious Resonator with the power to absorb all sounds. Currently journeying to find their lost memories.
quote: Is this the beginning of a new journey? Brimming with novel sounds, and untold stories...

resonanceChain.name: Odyssey of Beginnings
resonanceChain.description: Rover's Crit. Rate is increased by {0} for {1}s when casting Resonance Skill **Resonating Slashes** or Resonance Skill **Resonating Spin**.

resonanceChain.name: Microcosmic Murmurs
resonanceChain.description: Rover's Spectro DMG Bonus is increased by {0}.

resonanceChain.name: Visages of Dust
resonanceChain.description: Rover's Energy Regen is increased by {0}.

resonanceChain.name: Resonating Lamella
resonanceChain.description: When casting Resonance Liberation **Echoing Resonance**, Rover continuously restores HP for all team members: HP equal to {0} of Rover's ATK will be restored every second for {1}s.

resonanceChain.name: Temporal Virtuoso
resonanceChain.description: Rover's Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus is increased by {0}.

resonanceChain.name: Echoes of Wanderlust
resonanceChain.description: Resonance Skill **Resonating Slashes** and Resonance Skill **Resonating Spin** reduces the target's Spectro DMG RES by {0} on hit for {1}s.

skills.name: Vibration Manifestation
skills.description:
**Basic Attack**
Rover performs up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing Spectro DMG**.
 
**Heavy Attack**
Rover consumes STA to attack the target, dealing Spectro DMG**.
 
**Heavy Attack: Resonance**
After **Basic Attack 3** or **Heavy Attack**, press the **Basic Attack** button at the right time to perform Heavy Attack **Resonance**, dealing Spectro DMG**.
 
**Heavy Attack: Aftertune**
After Heavy Attack **Resonance** or **Dodge Counter** hits a target, press the **Basic Attack** button to perform Heavy Attack **Aftertune**, dealing Spectro DMG**.
 
**Mid-air Attack**
Rover consumes STA to perform a Mid-Air Plunging Attack, dealing Spectro DMG**.
 
**Dodge Counter**
Use **Basic Attack** after a successful **Dodge** to attack the target, dealing Spectro DMG**.

skills.name: Resonating Slashes
skills.description: Rover launches an attack forward, dealing Spectro DMG**.

skills.name: Echoing Orchestra
skills.description: Rover converges Spectro energy to assail the target area, detonating it after a short delay and dealing Spectro DMG**.

skills.name: Reticence
skills.description: Damage dealt by Rover's Basic Attack **Resonating Echoes** is increased by 60%**.

skills.name: Silent Listener
skills.description: Rover gains 15%** ATK increase for 5**s upon casting Heavy Attack **Resonance**.

skills.name: Waveshock
skills.description: Rover attacks the target, dealing Spectro DMG**.

skills.name: World in a Grain of Sand
skills.description:
**Resonance Skill: Resonating Spin**
If "Diminutive Sound" exceeds 50** when **Resonance Skill** is used, Rover consumes 50** "Diminutive Sound" to cast **Resonating Spin**, dealing Spectro DMG**, considered as Resonance Skill damage.
 
**Basic Attack: Resonating Echoes**
After Resonance Skill **Resonating Spin** ends, Rover performs **Resonating Echoes** upon pressing the Basic Attack button.
Launch attacks forward, dealing Spectro DMG**, considered as Resonance Skill DMG.
 
**Diminutive Sound**
Rover can hold up to 100** "Diminutive Sounds".
Rover obtains "Diminutive Sound" for every Normal Attack **Vibration Manifestation** on hit.
Rover obtains "Diminutive Sound" for every Heavy Attack ** Aftertune** on hit.
Rover obtains "Diminutive Sound" upon casting Intro Skill **Waveshock**.

skills.name: Instant
skills.description: Generate an area of stasis surrounding the next character, lasting for 3**s.
